# State of PLAY {-}

These files summarize the current state of the project.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(ggplot2)
```


## Last month {-}

```{r}
targets::tar_load(screen_df)
```

```{r}
now <- ymd(Sys.Date())
month_ago <- now - dmonths(1)
screen_last_month_df <- screen_df %>%
  dplyr::filter(submit_date > month_ago)
n_screens <- dim(screen_last_month_df)[1] 
```

There have been `r n_screens` recruiting calls since `r month_ago`.

```{r fig-last-mo-calls, fig.cap="Screening calls in last month by site"}
calls_by_site_plot(screen_last_month_df)
```


```{r}
targets::tar_load(home_visit_df)
home_last_month_df <- home_visit_df %>%
   dplyr::filter(date_today > month_ago)
n_home_visits <- dim(home_last_month_df)[1] 
```

There have been `r n_home_visits` home visits since `r month_ago`.

**Calls/visits ratio**: `r n_screens/n_home_visits`.

```{r fig-last-mo-home-visit, fig.cap="Home visits in last month by site"}
calls_by_site_plot(home_last_month_df)
```
